mapper.insert: insert into sea_type (tid, upid, tname, tenname, torder, templist, templist_1, templist_2, title, keyword, description, ishidden, tptype, unionid) values (#{tid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{upid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{tname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tenname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{torder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{templist,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{templist1,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{templist2,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{keyword,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ishidden,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{tptype,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{unionid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sea_type set upid = #{upid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, tname = #{tname,jdbcType=CHAR}, tenname = #{tenname,jdbcType=CHAR}, torder = #{torder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, templist = #{templist,jdbcType=CHAR}, templist_1 = #{templist1,jdbcType=CHAR}, templist_2 = #{templist2,jdbcType=CHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=CHAR}, keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=CHAR}, ishidden = #{ishidden,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, tptype = #{tptype,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, unionid = #{unionid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where tid = #{tid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
